title: Debauchery - Fuck Humanity (Limited Edition 3 CD) 2015 320ak
description:
Germany's Debauchery formed back in 2000, and since then has been making more waves overseas than they have here in North America. 
Over the years, the band unleashed eight full-length efforts, all of which have been met with a myriad of mixed reactions. Earlier releases had largely been Well received. 
 Fuck Humanity, a recording expressed by the band as a response to those individuals by declaring "Debauchery has always been something unique. Some people missed the point, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s why they can fuck off!" 
But does the newly revamped line-up of Mr. Kill on guitar, Mr. Debauchery for guitar and vocals (presumably founding member Thomas Gurrath), Mr. Death on drums, and Mr. Blood on bass, cement their claim as one of Germany's premiere death metal acts, or is this a unfortunate step backwards?
As usual the peeps will have the last word, you will like or you wont. I just serve it up, you decide.

AND YES this time it is the full length 3 CD edition,I post what I say, in time

Fuck Humanity
Debauchery
